title: libffm_model
description: IntroductionField-Aware Factorization is a powerful representation learning. Github here. This notebook demonstrates a way to use libffm binaries into a Kaggle kernel. Release Notes :  V4 : New version with Out-of-Fold V6 : fixed the encoder, previous version was kind of a regularizer :)
